com.github.besherman.lifx

Class LFXAlarm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.besherman.lifx.LFXAlarm

  • public class LFXAlarm
extends Object
    Specifies an alarm for a light.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LFXAlarm()
      Creates an alarm with standard values.
      LFXAlarm(Date time)
      Creates an alarm that will turn on the light at the given time.
      LFXAlarm(Date time, boolean power)
      Creates an alarm that will turn the light on or of at the given time.
      LFXAlarm(Date time, boolean power, long duration, LFXHSBKColor color)
      Creates an alarm that will turn the light on or of at a given time and fading to the given color.
      LFXAlarm(Date time, boolean power, long duration, LFXWaveform waveform)
      Creates an alarm that will turn the light on or of at a given time and fading to the given waveform.
      LFXAlarm(Date time, LFXHSBKColor color)
      Creates an alarm that will turn on the light at the given time with color.
      LFXAlarm(Date time, LFXHSBKColor color, long duration)
      Creates an alarm that will turn on the light at the given time and fade to the color.
      LFXAlarm(LFXAlarm other)
      Creates a copy of other.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(Object obj) 
      LFXHSBKColor getColor()
      Returns the color that the alarm will set.
      long getDuration()
      Returns the fade duration in milliseconds.
      boolean getPower()
      Returns true if the light will be turned on when the alarm is triggered.
      Date getTime()
      Returns the date when the alarm is to go off.
      LFXWaveform getWaveform()
      Returns the light's waveform.
      int hashCode()
      LFXAlarm reschedule(Date newTime)
      Creates a copy of this alarm with a different time.
      String toString()

      • LFXAlarm

        public LFXAlarm()
        Creates an alarm with standard values.

      • LFXAlarm

        public LFXAlarm(Date time)
        Creates an alarm that will turn on the light at the given time.

      • LFXAlarm

        public LFXAlarm(Date time,
        LFXHSBKColor color)
        Creates an alarm that will turn on the light at the given time with color.

      • LFXAlarm

        public LFXAlarm(Date time,
        LFXHSBKColor color,
        long duration)
        Creates an alarm that will turn on the light at the given time and fade to the color.
        Parameters:
        time - when the alarm will trigger
        color - the color to set the light to
        duration - fade time in milliseconds.

      • LFXAlarm

        public LFXAlarm(Date time,
        boolean power)
        Creates an alarm that will turn the light on or of at the given time.

      • LFXAlarm

        public LFXAlarm(Date time,
        boolean power,
        long duration,
        LFXHSBKColor color)
        Creates an alarm that will turn the light on or of at a given time and fading to the given color.
        Parameters:
        time - the time when the alarm will trigger.
        power - if true the light will be turned on
        duration - the fade duration in milliseconds
        color - the color to set the light to

      • LFXAlarm

        public LFXAlarm(Date time,
        boolean power,
        long duration,
        LFXWaveform waveform)
        Creates an alarm that will turn the light on or of at a given time and fading to the given waveform.
        Parameters:
        time - the time when the alarm will trigger.
        power - if true the light will be turned on
        duration - the fade duration in milliseconds
        waveform - the waveform to set the light to

        public LFXAlarm(LFXAlarm other)
        Creates a copy of other.

    • Method Detail

      • reschedule

        public LFXAlarm reschedule(Date newTime)
        Creates a copy of this alarm with a different time.

      • getTime

        public Date getTime()
        Returns the date when the alarm is to go off.

      • getPower

        public boolean getPower()
        Returns true if the light will be turned on when the alarm is triggered.

      • getDuration

        public long getDuration()
        Returns the fade duration in milliseconds. The fade duration is the time from the light starts to change to the time that the light has reached the indicated color.

      • getWaveform

        public LFXWaveform getWaveform()
        Returns the light's waveform.

      • getColor

        public LFXHSBKColor getColor()
        Returns the color that the alarm will set. This method delegates to the waveform's color.
